logentry.msg: [#12093] Fix a bug that attach button is not displayed below comment box while the artifact is in draft mode; Remove a check whether the user has permission to attach a file or not, because the check fails always and already done corretly when $html_body_attach is created.
logentry.author: semtlnori

logentry.msg: [#12092] Fix an error that checkboxes for mass-update are not displayed even if the user has permission on that. And rename the flag to determine whether someone has the permission or not, from $is_editable to $is_massupdateable.
logentry.author: semtlnori

logentry.msg: [#11173] Fix a bug that Acl::getLevelFromPermissions returns wrong permission level for project admin; Treat level 'A' as higher level than 0.
logentry.author: semtlnori

logentry.msg:
merged from trunk/nforge to 3.0-access-control
* r4030: [#5504] Replace exception throwing with logging because Mass Update should be continued even if updating one of artifacts is failed.
logentry.author: semtlnori

merged from trunk/nforge to 3.0-access-control

logentry.author: semtlnori

logentry.msg:
merged from branch/2.8-stable to nforge
* r4002: [#2749] Fix interpreter from /usr/bin/php5 to /usr/bin/php. Some systems like fedora does not treat php interpreter as /usr/bin/php5 even if it has PHP5 interperter.
logentry.author: semtlnori

logentry.msg: [#2749] Fix interpreter from /usr/bin/php5 to /usr/bin/php. Some systems like fedora does not treat php interpreter as /usr/bin/php5 even if it has PHP5 interperter.
logentry.author: semtlnori

logentry.msg:
merged from branch/2.8-stable to nforge
* r4000: [#11798] Fix a bug that getDBVersion() returns wrong db version. It has caused to store invalid db version in system_setting table.
logentry.author: semtlnori
